A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First of all to all of those who didn't like this movie for your verious reasons I will say that you are not wrong.  Many of the same things that many of you didn't like didn't completely work for me.  I felt some of the humor\, even though the majority of the jokes landed for me\, I did find some of them inappropiately placed. The Finn/Rose subplot didn't completely work for me either.  I can also see where the hardcore Star Wars lore fans that read all the books\, comics\, and gamers are having a difficult time with it because there are points where the characterd are not always acting like you would expect or like them to.  On the flip side I didn't let those few moments ruin the entire movie either.\n     Inspite of this movie's little issues here and there I found it highly entertaining\, was I entertained is my highest criteria for any rating I give a movie\, and overall alot of fun and exciting to watch. Overall a great time at the movies.
